attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: This app is literally the worse app I have ever seen. Please do not buy it!!! I literally want to throw up whenever I go on it. Horrible!!!

attributes.title: Tik tok
attributes.review: I opened this app excited to check out the features and for some reason it glitched and it showed a picture of a orange piece of fruit. Oh wait. That was trump. Oops.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE DO NOT GET
attributes.review:
I got this app as a joke but then I realized I’m a Democrat and could never support trump for so many reasons. thanks for your time
BLACK LIVES MATTER!!!
Hope ur app gets taken down, kisses!

attributes.title: this app is evil
attributes.review: this app took 2 years to download and wasted all of my battery and data everyday. it gave me nightmares and haunted me. when i finally opened the app it stole all my credit card information and ss number. i am appalled and confused. i hate this app it deserves to be removed. hateful disgusting app made by a racist✨🧚‍♀️💕💫

attributes.title: no thank you
attributes.review: terrible customer service I asked to see the manager and the fbi came to my house

attributes.title: Tiktok ✨🧚🏼‍♀️🤧
attributes.review: My fingers slipped and accidentally went to 1 but I was looking forward to great things about this app and I’ve received nothing.

attributes.title: ruined my life
attributes.review:
this is not an exaggeration. firstly, this app took 10 hrs to download which i was like what? no app ever does that.. then when i finally opened it, there was a massive s c h l o n g to greet me and i was disgusted for months. i’m only just now writing this review bc i’m getting over the trauma this caused me. 
don’t download this app. for your own mental health, dont.

attributes.title: This app is terrible just like trump !
attributes.review:
This app needs to be taken down! I NEVER read the terms of service but c’mon this is out of control. Upon clicking agree my phone was COMPLETELY HACKED AND WIPED 
!!😤😭 TRUMP IS CANCELLED!!!! Period.

attributes.title: Horrible!!
attributes.review: This app is downright awful, I think it even gave my phone a virus, just like how trump literally gave one to the country.

attributes.title: Frozen
attributes.review: The app doesn't work. The one time I got it open it froze my phone and I had to restart it.
